        <span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51)">错误</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51)">1</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51)">：</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51)">Unable to load native-hadoop library</span>  </h3>

                <span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px">无法为你的平台加载本地</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px">hadoop</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px">类库</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px">... </span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px">程序使用了内部类</span><span style="padding:0px; margin:0px; color:rgb(229,51,51); font-size:14px"> </span><br style="padding:0px; margin:0px">
